scripts.dev:all: concurrently "bun run dev:website" "bun run dev:api-server" "bun run dev:scrapper" "bun run dev:suction-server" "bun run dev:suction-client"
scripts.build:all: bun run build:website && bun run build:api-server && bun run build:scrapper && bun run build:suction-server && bun run build:suction-client
scripts.test:all: bun run test:website && bun run test:api-server && bun run test:scrapper && bun run test:suction-server && bun run test:suction-client
scripts.lint:all: bun run --cwd apps/website lint && bun run --cwd apps/api-server lint && bun run --cwd apps/scrapper lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.next apps/*/bin
